title: 3DTILES_bounding_volume_cylinder extension
description: 3D Tiles extension for cylinder region bounding volumes.

minRadius.description: The inner radius of the cylinder region along the x and y axes, in meters.

maxRadius.description: The outer radius of the cylinder region along the x and y axes, in meters.

height.description: The height of the cylinder in meters along the z-axis, in meters.

minAngle.description: The minimum angle of the cylinder region in radians. In other words, this is the angle where the cylinder region starts. Must be in the range [-pi, pi].

maxAngle.description: The maximum angle of the cylinder region in radians. In other words, this is the angle where the cylinder region ends. Must be in the range [-pi, pi].

translation.description: The cylinder's translation along the x, y, and z axes.

rotation.description: The cylinder's rotation, represented by a unit quaternion in the order (x, y, z, w), where w is the scalar.
